User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

When entering log in details, when the cursor is in the password field, my keyboard layout changes.  e.g. it is set to US ordinarily, but when the focus changes, the input method switches to Colemak.  Also, there is no way to change back to US layout.  As long as the focus is in a password field, the only selections available to me out of the six I have enabled are Colemak and French. 

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Set focus to a password field either by clicking or tabbing into it
2. IME changes
Actual Results:  
Input method changes from US to Colemak, with no ability to change back

Expected Results:  
Input method should have stayed the same.

Keyboard layouts enabled:
US
French
Hiragana
Katakana
Greek Polytonic
Colemak

Available choice of layouts when in password field:
French
Colemak
comments.author: rubahness@gmail.com
